creditline: Gift of funds from Mrs. Eunice Dwan
inscription:
Signature, Date and Inscription

on bottom of cup, in gold: [No 13 Roman St.]; on either side of image on cup, in gold: [To My Wife. / Geo. Pegram, / Master] and [D. F. Smith / H. H. Walker, / Clerks.]; at edges of saucer, in gold: [G.P.], [D.F.S.] and [H.H.W.]
signed: below image on cup, LRC, in brown: [R. T. Lux. N.O. '65.]
title: Cup and Saucer
